string-array.name: onboarding_page_descriptions
string-array.item: The easiest way to send letters to your loved one, even if your\'e not Shakespeare
Compose letters that make your loved one smile, or pick one from our beautiful collection
We will remind you once a week to send a letter so you won\'t miss a chance to strengthen your relationship

string-array.name: phrases
string-array.item: Just wanted to say thank you for who you are, I\'m grateful for what you bring into my life, I\'m grateful for our relationship and grateful for myself for choosing you
Even if I don\'t tell you this every single day, I want you to know that you are a big, shining light in my life

I\'m happy to have you with me because we have a special bong. I know this because I can feel it. The world is full in opportunities and distractions, and within all this choosing you was one of the good and wisest things I\'ve done
We have been through so many things, joy and difficulties and pleasure and pain. When I look backwards and see how much you\'ve taught me about myself, all I have left is to thank you
When was the last time I told you that you\'re beautiful? Actually it doesn\'t matter, it\'s always a good time to say this again :)

Our love is a beautiful thing, deep and beautiful. It\'s a cosy home to return to after a long day and a source of power to moe on. I want you to always remember that you are the good energy of my life.
